title: Shark Tank 2.0 - Reality Show
description: How to bring visibility and engagement to DApps built on Cardano? How to attract new users and create a strong ecosystem of DApps?
solution: A new concept of reality show for startups that will give huge exposure for DApps built on top of Cardano and accepting ADA as gas/payments
experience: Building a Layer 2 protocol for decentralised communities in partnership with Autonomy Network (Santosh Yellajosula)
